ul.li:
Added support for the following phones:
Snom D712, D725, D745, D765, D785, D120, M215 SC, C520-WiMi
Htek UC926E, UC924E, UC912, UC912G, UC802T, UC803T, UC804T, UC804G, UC806T, UC806G
Gigaset Maxwell basic, Maxwell 2, Maxwell 3
Optimized the Time Zone setting of Yealink, Snom, Htek, and Gigaset phones.
Fixed the issue that Grandstream phones would reboot continually if the PBX was in Hot-Standby status.
Fixed the time zone settings issue on Fanvil phones.
Compatible with Yeastar S-Series V30.7.0.10.

Added support for the following IP phones:
Snom D715
Escene ES330-PEG, ES330-PEN, ES620-PEG, ES280-P, ES206-PN, ES205-PN
Univois U6S, U1S, U3S
Added support for auto provisioning transfer mode on Yealink phones.
Added support for dynamic VPK keys on Grandstream phones.
Added Name setting for Fanvil X4 DSS Key.
Added support for Fanvil X3S template.
Added the date format DD/MM/YYYY for Yealink T41S.
Added “Default” language setting for Yealink phones.
Updated default templates for Snom phones.
Fixed the issue that if a phone was provisioned with multiple accounts, only one account name was displayed.
Fixed the issue that PBX could not scan and detect Yealink T40G.
Fixed the issue that PBX could not scan and detect Tiptel phones.
Fixed the issue that auto provisioning for Snom phones only worked when the “Register Name” was the same as the extension number.
Fixed the DSS key issue on Fanvil X6.
Fixed the voicemail issue on Yealink default template.
Fixed the translation error on German web.

Added support for the following IP phones:
Yealink CP860, CP960, CP920, W60B
Fanvil H2, H3, H5
Mitel 6863i, 6865i, 6867i, 6869i, 6873i

Optimized Daylight Saving Time setting:
If you set Daylight Saving Time to Automatic, you can set a location for your time zone.
Changed the default language of Fanvil phones to English.
Added support for auto provisioning BLF keys on Vtech VSP735.
Added support for auto provisioning the settings on Cisco SPA phones: admin password, time zone, daylight saving time, language, dictionary server script.
Fixed the issue that auto provisioning for DSS keys on Fanvil phones could not work.
Fixed the issue that auto provisioning of Yealink T23P could not work.
Fixed the issue that auto provisioning of Fanvil X5S could not work.
Fixed the provisioning issue on extensions: the register name of extension is incorrect.
Added support for the compatibility with S-Series firmware 30.5.0.30 version.
Added support for Yealink IP Phones: T52S, T54S.
Added support for Yealink IP Phones: T58A, T58V, T56A.
Added support for Fanvil IP Phones: X2, X6.
Fixed the Cisco SPA IP Phone auto provisioning issue: provisioning file created failed.
Fixed the Yealink IP Phone auto provisioning issue: not able to choose Location when Daylight Saving Time is Automatic.
Fixed the issue that auto provision for Grandstream GXP 3240 could not work.
Fixed the Yeastar TA Gateway auto provisioning issue: when scanning the devices in the LAN, the TA devices would not be updated.
Fixed the issue that auto provision for Snom IP Phones function key and Label could not work.
Fixed the Tiptel 32XX series IP Phone auto provisioning issue: IP Phones could not download the provisioning files.
Fixed the Time Zone saving failed issue.
Fixed the PnP server memory leak issue.
Fixed Auto Provisioning issue: after upgrading the Auto Provisioning App, the Grandstream phone configurations would disappear.
Added support for Akuvox IP phones: SP-R50P, SP-R52P, SP-R53P, SP-R55P, SP-R59P, SP-R55G, SP-R59G, SP-R63G, SP-R67G, VP-R47P, VP-R47G, VP-R48G, and VP-R49P.
Added support for Alcatel IP phones: IP251G, IP301G, IP701G, and IP2115.
Added support for Fanvil IP phones: X4 and X5S.
Added support for Yealink IP phones: T41S, T42S, T46S, T48S and T27G.
Added support for Panasonic IP phones: HDV100, HDV130, HDV230, HDV330 and HDV430.
Added support for auto provisioning Dutch language for Yealink phones.
Fixed TA provisioning issue: setting “Key as Send” to “Disable” could not take effect.
Fixed Yealink provisioning issue: if the extensions were registered by auto provisioning method, users could not successfully call back from the phone’s history.
Added support for Akuvox IP phones: SP-R50P, SP-R52P, SP-R53P, SP-R55P, SP-R59P, SP-R55G, SP-R59G, SP-R63G, SP-R67G, VP-R47P, VP-R47G, VP-R48G, and VP-R49P.
Added support for Alcatel IP phones: IP251G, IP301G, IP701G, and IP2115.
Added support for Fanvil IP phones: X4 and X5S.
Added support for Yealink IP phones: T41S, T42S, T46S, T48S and T27G.
Added support for Panasonic IP phones: HDV100, HDV130, HDV230, HDV330 and HDV430.
Added support for auto provisioning Dutch language for Yealink phones.
Fixed TA provisioning issue: setting “Key as Send” to “Disable” could not take effect.
Fixed Yealink provisioning issue: if the extensions were registered by auto provisioning method, users could not successfully call back from the phone’s history.
Added support for French, Italian Web interface.
Updated Turkish Web interface.
Added Auto Provisioning Template feature. Users could add a template first, then apply the template settings to specific IP phones or gateways.
Fixed auto provisioning issue: the system would respond NOTIFY packages to all local the IP phones, and caused registration failure for the non-auto-provisioned IP phones.
Added support for Alcatel IP phones: IP100, IP150, IP151, IP300, IP700G, IP1850 and IP2015.
Added support for vTech IP phones: VSP600A, VSP610A, VSP715A, VSP716A, VSP725A, VSP726A, VSP735A, VSP736A and VCS754A.
Added support for provision Yealink phone to Czech web language.
Added support for Fanvil MAC address fields: 00a859, 00b869, 0c385E and 0c386E.
Added “Hostname” setting for Yeastar TA gateways.
Fixed the issue that auto provision for Tiptel 30XX series phonebook could not work.
Fixed the issue that auto provision for Grandstream GXP 2160 could not work.

Fixed the Yeastar TA gateway auto provisioning issue: if the TA gateway’s LAN settings were not edited, the TA gateway’s IP address, hostname, web login username and password would be cleared; some specific TA ports might not be registered.
When you upload Tiptel phonebook to S-Series PBX, you can choose phone type and upload different phonebooks.

Added support for the following IP phones:
Cisco SPA301, SPA303, SPA501G, SPA502G, SPA504G, SPA508G, SPA509G, SPA512G, SPA514G, SPA525G2, CP7821
Polycom VVX101, VVX201, VVX300, VVX310, VVX400, VVX500, VVX600, VVX601, VVX1500, IP321, IP331, IP335, IP450, IP550, IP560, IP670
Htek UC902, UC903, UC923

Auto Provisioning supports the following IP phones:
Yealink T19P-E2, T21P-E2, T23G, T23P, T27G, T29G, T40P, T41P, T42G, T46G, T48G, T49G, W52P, W56P
Fanvil C01, C400, C58/C58P, C600, X3/X3P/X3SP, X5/X5G
Snom 320, 710, 715, 720, 725, 760, 765, D305, D315, D345, D375
Grandstream GXP1100, GXP1105, GXP1160, GXP1165, GXP1400, GXP1405, GXP1450, GXP1610, GXP1620, GXP1625, GXP1628, GXP1630, GXP2130, GXP2135, GXP2140, GXP2160, GXP2170, GXP2200, GXV3240, GXV3275
Htek UC802, UC803, UC804, UC806, UC840, UC842, UC860, UC862, UC924, UC926
Tiptel 3110, 3120, 3130, 3210, 3220, 3230, 3240, 3245, 3275, 3220XL
Fixed the issue that if you reset the system, Auto Provisioning could not work properly with TFTP server.
